bibdata.title: Recommended Practice for 1 to 35 kV Medium Voltage DC Power Systems on Ships
Recommended Practice for 1 to 35 kV Medium Voltage DC Power Systems on Ships
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1709/D1.1, Feb 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard recommends guidelines to specify, procure, design, 1 manufacture and develop manuals, safety procedures, practices and procedures for effective maintenance of Medium Voltage DC (MVDC) electrical power systems. Recommendations are made for analytical methods, preferred interconnection interfaces and performance characteristics for reliable integration of MVDC Electrical components into the Ship MVDC electrical power systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
